          <title>
            <string language="en">Reducing friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verringern von von Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réduction du frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reduzindo a fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riduzione dell'attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μείωση της τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reducción de la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the force of friction is less on a polished floor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polishing</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Kraft der 
Friktion kleiner auf einem polierten Fußboden ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la force du 
frottement est moins sur un plancher poli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a força da 
fricção está menos em um assoalho lustrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la forza di 
attrito è di meno su un pavimento lucidato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η δύναμη της τριβής 
είναι λιγότερος σε ένα γυαλισμένο πάτωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la fuerza de la 
fricción está menos en un suelo pulido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
